revised_title: Obituary of William Edward Ayrton: Pioneering Electrical Engineer and Educator
tldr: This obituary honors the life and work of William Edward Ayrton, a prominent electrical engineer and educator. Ayrton made significant contributions to the field of electrical engineering, including the improvement of telegraphic methods, the establishment of advanced electrical laboratories, and the development of educational methods that emphasized hands-on laboratory work. His influence on the field and his dedication to teaching continue to be felt today.
